Scheme.select: update t_rate set rate='#rate#',content='#content#',time=to_date('#time#','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi'),project_id='#project_id#',root_id='#root_id#' where 1=1 [and user_id='#user_id#'] [and rate_user='#rate_user#'] [and to_char(time,'yyyy-MM-dd')='#date#']

select *,(select user_name from t_user where 1=1 [and user_id='#user_id#']) as rate_user_name, (select phone from t_user where 1=1 [and user_id='#user_id#']) as rate_user_phone, (select project_name from t_project where 1=1 project_id=t_rate.project_id) as project_name, (select project_name from t_project where 1=1 and project_id=t_rate.root_id) as root_project_name from t_rate where 1=1 [and user_id='#user_id#'] [and rate_user='#rate_user#'] [and to_char(time,'yyyy-MM-dd')='#time#']
